publications.title: **A First Look at Self-Admitted Miscommunications in GitHub Issues**
publications.description: Misdiagnosis of tumors often leads to ineffective treatments, reducing patient survival rates. This study explores a unique hybrid approach, merging deep learning with traditional machine learning for accurate brain tumor detection and classification. Alongside, a custom CCNN+ML hybrid method was implemented, further refining results. MRI images were enhanced using Contrast Limited Adaptive Histogram Equalization (CLAHE) to optimize feature quality, boosting diagnostic precision.

publications.title: **A First Look at Self-Admitted Miscommunications in GitHub Issues**
notes: Accepted - (ICCA 2024 - International Conference on Computing Advancements)
